title: Music Copyrights Specialist I - Nevada Applicants Only
description:
Company Summary:

Orfium is a fast-growing music technology company representing some of the biggest music companies in the world. We are looking for talented, hardworking people to join our rights management team who are passionate about protecting the value of music. Our office is located in Malibu, CA with a beautiful ocean view overlooking the Malibu Pier. Some of our clients include: Warner Music Group, Sony Music Group, Sony/ATV Music Publishing, Warner Chappell Music Publishing, Global Music Rights, Ingrooves, Red Bull, and many more.

Position Summary: The Music Copyrights Specialist is responsible for identifying and claiming videos that indicate copyright music/infringement through Youtube’s content management system (CMS). This role requires the analysis of music and revenue data as well as staying up to date with industry trends in entertainment. This is an advanced professional with a high degree of knowledge in the overall field and recognized expertise in specific areas; problem‐solving frequently requires analysis of unique issues/problems without precedent and/or structure.


This position is only open to Nevada residents only


Duties/Responsibilities:

  • Employees are expected to acquire the skills and knowledge necessary to perform work necessary for the role through defined training and development planning.
  • Analyze music on a harmonic, melodic, lyrical, and sonic level.
  • Extreme attention to detail, data-driven, excellent communication skills, and a self-starter.
  • Identify and claim videos using copyrighted music through YouTube’s content management system.
  • Support the policing of piracy and copyright infringement by monitoring the unauthorized exploitation of our clients’ copyrights.
  • Remain up to date with industry topics and music.
  • Collect and analyze revenue data to discover valuable content for our clients.
  • Other duties that may be assigned to help the company meet goals.
  • Growth opportunities within this role based on performance
  • Employees should perform at a minimum, milestone 4 for a minimum of 12 months from the date of hire as designated by their manager.
  • Perform other duties and responsibilities, as assigned.
requirements:
Qualifications:

  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills; extremely detail-oriented.
  • Exhibits professional demeanor and sound judgment.
  • Follows up on delegated assignments through completion.
  • Self-starter, who takes initiative and is resourceful; takes ownership of tasks and projects.
  • Ability to adjust to changes of the industry, new guidelines made either internally or by our clients
  • Ability to multitask and prioritize; works well under pressure.
  • Ability to work autonomously and collaboratively.
  • Excellent typing and computer skills, including in Word, Excel, Outlook.
  • Advanced computer experience: Microsoft WordExcel, Internet search, Google trends.
  • Intermediate musical experience with an exceptional ear.
  • High school diploma required, preferred BA or BS degree from an accredited college or university.

Supervisory Responsibilities:

This position does not directly supervise.


Essential Work & Physical Requirements:

The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to talk and hear.

  • Available to work a minimum of 40 hours per week and a minimum of 5 days per week.
  • Prolonged periods of sitting at a desk and working on a computer.
  • Must be able to lift up to 15 pounds at times.

Orfium is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

description:
A few things about Orfium

In Orfium we are building the digital future of the Music and Media Industry, by providing complete solutions to generate and manage revenue, promote content, and provide business insights.

YouTube, Spotify, Apple, Netflix, and various other platforms have changed the experience of the audience. On our part, we are building the technology to find content on digital platforms, recognize it, and match it with the catalogs of the owners. We are developing solutions based on Big Data, Machine Learning, and Business Intelligence to provide Enterprise services and complete SaaS solutions.

Orfium currently serves some of the biggest clients in Entertainment, as the leading Copyrights Management and Information Technology company. With our HQ in Malibu, CA, and our R&D department in Athens, Greece, we are able to serve the biggest markets while we innovate fast.

If you believe you can make a difference by joining one of the fastest-growing tech companies in the world, you should definitely apply!


WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR

A skillful and passionate Product Manager that will manage one of our main B2B products for delivering value on YouTube. That means that we need a good understanding of the enterprise software, a data-driven mindset, and the management of a product lifecycle.

The ideal candidate will have a startup mindset along with analytical thinking skills and will be willing to take initiatives and execute the product strategy effectively and report back with ideas that will improve our Product Suite and Operations.


WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING

You will be a part of a Design-driven, Agile Product Team and will:

  • Drive a multi-disciplinary team of engineers to solve big problems in the music industry with Big Data and AI characteristics.
  • Analyze business requirements and prioritize tickets for the relevant teams
  • Monitor the performance of products
  • Collaborate with the Product Management and Design Team to build a Product Roadmap.
  • Collaborate with Tech Leaders in order to achieve deadlines and deliver products efficiently
  • Align with the Operations department in order to locate any possible issues and deficiencies for B2B products
  • Design and run experiments
  • Explore opportunities for new products, new business models and prepare the roadmap for new versions of existing products
requirements:
NEEDED SKILLS

  • Proven experience as a product manager or product owner
  • Proven knowledge of Agile methodologies
  • Passion for innovation and impact
  • Good design perception
  • Strong written and verbal Greek and English communication skills

EXTRA POINTS:

  • Love for music!
  • Agile certifications
  • An academic background in computer science, or proven programming skills
  • Previous experience in a startup company
  • Familiarity with Programming Languages and Frameworks (Python, Django framework, React Framework, and more)
  • Experience in Big Data, Analytics or Payment projects or products
  • MBA or Master in Business

What we need

We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to join our Engineering team of the Greek branch in Koukaki, Attica. We strongly believe that a DevOps culture can greatly accelerate an engineering team and improve its performance. As we've doubled in size during the last year, our ideal candidate is someone with a strong automation mindset to help us empower every engineering team and make it autonomous using DevOps practices.
requirements:
What you will be doing

  • Help us build and develop amazing applications in AWS
  • Manage cloud infrastructure
  • Package software suites for SaaS offerings
  • Automate deployment and monitoring of cloud applications and services
  • Create development environments in AWS utilizing CloudFormation
  • Work closely with engineering teams to constantly improve our development workflows

Needed skills

  • Automation enthousiast
  • Strong experience managing AWS
  • Good knowledge of CloudFormation
  • Experience with CI/CD
  • Proficient in Linux administration
  • Experience with Docker
  • Experience with Python and shell scripting
  • Experience in monitoring and troubleshooting production systems
  • BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field
  • Terraform is a plus
  • AWS Certificates (Solutions Architect, DevOps) are a plus
